vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Fair Park Tower Building Rehabilitation located at 3809 Grand Avenue - Phoenix I Restoration and Construction, Ltd., best value proposer of one - Not to exceed $4,208,000.00 - Financing: Fair Park Capital Reserve Fund ($452,000.00), Fair Park Improvements (C) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($2,975,722.23), and Fair Park Improvements (C) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($780,277.77)
